abstract: Inside the Meeniyan Junior Country Fire Authority (CFA) and how they keep the future generations involved in the CFA. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from South Gippsland'.
description: The next generation of fire fighters start young. In an effort to encourage the young people of Meeniyan to become senior CFA members, the Meeniyan Junior CFA creates an atmosphere of fun and friendship while teaching kids the basics of fire fighting.
